monsters.name: Wolf
monsters.description: The wolf is very large and has greyish fur and icey blue eyes. It growls at you menacingly and bares its teeth.

monsters.name: Huge Rat
monsters.description: The huge rat resembles rats you've seen before, except that it is about two feet tall at the shoulder, and seems much more aggressive.

monsters.name: Giant Scorpion
monsters.description: The giant scorpion resembles a common scorpion, except that it is over eight feet in length.

monsters.name: Huge Toad
monsters.description: The huge toad resembles a common toad, except that it is just over three feet tall, and seems very aggressive.

monsters.name: Giant Slug
monsters.description: The giant slug is over seven feet long and drools acidic spittle from its maw.
abilities: discharged a spray of acid at

special_attack.description: discharged a spray of acid at

monsters.name: Giant Bat
monsters.description: The giant bat has a wingspan of over twelve feet and has wicked looking claws and teeth.

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.description: The giant spider's body is over six feet long, and it has thick hairy legs. A thick oily liquid drips from its mandibles.

monsters.name: Fire Beetle
monsters.description: The fire beetle is a huge reddish brown beetle, about four feet long, with a thick shiny carapace, and strong, wickedly sharp mandibles.

monsters.name: Alligator
monsters.description: The alligator watches your every move closely and snaps at you.

monsters.name: Giant Asp
monsters.description: The giant asp is an enormous viper over twenty feet in length. Its scales are a dull tan and it's body is thicker than a large man's arm.

monsters.name: Anaconda
monsters.description: The anaconda is an enormous constrictor snake well over forty feet in length. Its scales range in color from an emerald green to a dark blue, and its body is thicker than some tree trunks you've seen.

monsters.name: Lizard Woman
monsters.description: The lizard woman is a five foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. She has greyish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. The lizard woman is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Lizard Man
monsters.description: The lizard man is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. The lizard man is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Black Bear
monsters.description: The black bear has shaggy black fur run through with reddish brown streaks and stands well over four feet tall at the shoulder.

monsters.name: Red Bear
monsters.description: The red bear has shaggy reddish fur run through with black streaks and stands just over five feet tall at the shoulder.

monsters.name: Leopard
monsters.description: The leopard has luxurious looking spotted fur. It growls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

monsters.name: Wild Boar
monsters.description: The wild boar has dark coarse hair and makes a low whining sound. It has two sharp tusks which curve upwards from the sides of its mouth.

monsters.name: Cave Bear
monsters.description: The cave bear has dark brown fur and stands well over seven feet tall at the shoulder. Its teeth and claws gleam like daggers as it sizes you up.

monsters.name: Mountain Ape
monsters.description: The mountain ape is nearly seven feet tall, has thick reddish brown fur and looks very strong.

monsters.name: Carrion Crane
monsters.description: The carrion crane is nearly eight feet tall, has dull grey plumage and a very wicked looking hooked ebony beak.

monsters.name: Cave Lion
monsters.description: The cave lion is a huge black animal which stands over six feet tall at the shoulder and has wicked curved claws and razor sharp teeth.

monsters.name: Sand Worm
monsters.description: The sand worm is over fifty feet long, is covered in a hard ringed carapace, it's gaping maw is filled with many rows of wickedly gleaming teeth.

monsters.name: Magma Worm
monsters.description: The magma worm is over seventy feet long, is covered in a hard ringed carapace that glows a dull reddish color, and it's gaping maw is filled with many rows of wicked teeth.

monsters.name: Octopod
monsters.description: The octopod is a huge dark green bulbous plant standing nearly five feet tall, and has eight rubbery greenish tentacles.

monsters.name: White Rabbit
monsters.description: The white rabbit is large and fluffy with floppy ears and big brown eyes.

monsters.name: Black Rabbit
monsters.description: The black rabbit is large and fluffy with floppy ears and big brown eyes.

monsters.name: Pink Bunny
monsters.description: The pink bunny is small and fluffy with perky ears and big blue eyes.
abilities: gnashed its big pointy teeth at
becomes a berzerk flurry of gnashing teeth

special_attack.description: gnashed its big pointy teeth at

special_ability.name: Attack All and Tumble
special_ability.description: becomes a berzerk flurry of gnashing teeth

monsters.name: Lizard
monsters.description: The lizard is small and purple and moves very quickly.

monsters.name: Monkey
monsters.description: The monkey is quick and playful and watches you warily.

monsters.name: Owl
monsters.description: The owl is perched in a nearby tree watching you intently.

monsters.name: Squirrel
monsters.description: The squirrel sits in a nearby tree and chitters at you.

monsters.name: Frog
monsters.description: The frog is small and green and appears to be a good jumper.

monsters.name: Fox
monsters.description: The fox hides in the nearby brush and seems very skittish.

monsters.name: Hyena
monsters.description: The hyena looks ravenous and extremely viscious. It snarls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

monsters.name: Tiger
monsters.description: The tiger has luxurious looking striped fur. It growls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

monsters.name: Mountain Lion
monsters.description: The mountain lion has dark brown spotted fur. It growls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

monsters.name: Jackal
monsters.description: The jackal looks extremely viscious. It snarls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

monsters.name: Lizard Warrior
monsters.description: The lizard warrior is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Lizard Subchief
monsters.description: The lizard subchief is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Lizard Chieftain
monsters.description: The lizard chieftain is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is wearing ringmail armor and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Lizard Warlord
monsters.description: The lizard warlord is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is wearing scalemail armor and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Lizard Shaman
monsters.description: The lizard shaman is a five foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. She has greyish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. She is wearing robes and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Dwarven Warhound
monsters.description: The dwarven warhound is a huge beast, nearly four feet at the shoulder. It resembles  a wolf with glossy black fur. Its eyes and teeth are crimson. Its hackles raise and it snarls menacingly as you look its way.

monsters.name: Reaper Shrub
monsters.description: The reaper shrub is a squat thorny plant, moving slowly about on thick gnarled roots. Its spiney branches rustle ominously at your presence.

monsters.name: Ram
monsters.description: A sturdy ram with curved horns.
